text:
Proclamation under the Wills Act 2008

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Wills Act 2008 fix 1 March 2009 as the day on which that Act commences.

16 February 2009

PETER G. UNDERWOOD

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

LARA GIDDINGS

Minister for Justice

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 February 2009

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Justice.
